caption.p: The effect of extracts on the cell cycle. Quantitative determination based on propidium iodide (PI) staining was carried out using a flow cytometer. The results showed ( a) cell cycle histogram, ( b, c) the percentage of cell numbers. Data are presented as the means Â± SD, * p < 0.05 vs. control; ** p < 0.05 vs. 100 mM glucose alone. p values were 0.001, 0.001, 0.039 and 0.007 for 100 mM glucose, CHP, CHL and GA, respectively.
